plham.event

Class TradingHaltRule

  • plham.event.TradingHaltRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Any, Event, Market.MarketEvent, Market.OrderEvent

    public class TradingHaltRule
implements Market.MarketEvent, Market.OrderEvent
    A trading halt is a market regulation that suspends the trading of some assets. The current implementation sets Market#isRunning() = false when the price changed beyond the prespecified threshold range.
